p: Our findings revealed an inhibition of 62.29% of the paw oedema using the Ml EtOAcF compared to only 49.15% inhibition using the standard drug indomethacin after five hours ( P < 0.01). The anti-inflammatory effect of 200 mg/kg BW of Ml EtOAcF was comparable to that of the standard drug indomethacin ( Figure 1).
